name: CopperCube Laser Beam
description:
This i made just for fun- nothing fancy but can be useful.
Watch video or download file to see how it works.
Sound files i cant include so you need to use your own sounds..
3 sounds.. one is shot / second is impact/ third is beam sound.

To make it look even cooler you can attach light and particles to the end of the beam or at the start of the beam.
